name: Herbal Coconut Oil (100ml)
description: Pure cold-pressed virgin coconut oil enriched with natural herbs for hair and skin care. Perfect for daily nourishment.
usage: Apply to hair and scalp, massage gently. Leave for 30 minutes before washing

name: Herbal Argan Oil (50ml)
description: Premium Moroccan argan oil infused with ayurvedic herbs. Known as 'liquid gold' for ultimate nourishment.
usage: Apply few drops to face and hair. Use daily for best results

name: Herbal Eucalyptus Oil (30ml)
description: Therapeutic eucalyptus oil blended with traditional herbs for respiratory wellness and aromatherapy.
usage: Add 2-3 drops to steam inhalation or diffuser. For topical use, dilute with carrier oil

name: Herbal Lavender Oil (50ml)
description: Calming lavender oil enhanced with stress-relieving ayurvedic herbs for relaxation and peaceful sleep.
usage: Apply to temples and pulse points. Add to diffuser for aromatherapy benefits

name: Ashwagandha Capsules (60 caps)
description: Premium quality Ashwagandha root extract capsules for stress relief and energy boost. Natural adaptogen.
usage: Take 1-2 capsules daily with warm water after meals

name: Turmeric Curcumin Capsules (60 caps)
description: High potency turmeric curcumin capsules with black pepper extract for maximum absorption and anti-inflammatory benefits.
usage: Take 1 capsule twice daily with meals

name: Brahmi Memory Capsules (60 caps)
description: Pure Brahmi extract capsules to enhance memory, focus and cognitive function. Traditional brain tonic.
usage: Take 1 capsule daily in the morning with water

name: Triphala Digestive Capsules (60 caps)
description: Traditional Triphala blend capsules for digestive health and natural detoxification. Gentle daily cleanser.
usage: Take 1-2 capsules before bedtime with warm water

name: Neem Face Wash (100ml)
description: Gentle neem-based face wash for acne-prone skin. Natural antibacterial properties for clear, healthy skin.
usage: Apply to wet face, massage gently, rinse with water. Use twice daily

name: Turmeric Glow Face Pack (50g)
description: Natural turmeric and sandalwood face pack for glowing skin. Removes tan and brightens complexion.
usage: Mix with rose water, apply for 15 minutes, rinse off. Use 2-3 times weekly

name: Aloe Vera Moisturizer (100ml)
description: Pure aloe vera gel moisturizer for all skin types. Hydrates and soothes irritated skin naturally.
usage: Apply to clean skin, massage gently until absorbed. Use morning and evening

name: Rose Water Toner (150ml)
description: Pure rose water toner for refreshing and toning skin. Natural astringent with anti-aging benefits.
usage: Apply with cotton pad after cleansing. Use morning and evening

name: Amla Vitamin C Powder (100g)
description: Pure amla powder rich in natural Vitamin C. Boosts immunity and promotes healthy hair and skin.
usage: Mix 1 tsp with water or juice daily. Can be used in face packs

name: Moringa Leaf Powder (100g)
description: Nutrient-dense moringa leaf powder. Complete superfood with vitamins, minerals and antioxidants.
usage: Mix 1-2 tsp with smoothies, juice or water daily

name: Spirulina Powder (100g)
description: Premium quality spirulina powder. Rich in protein, vitamins and minerals for complete nutrition.
usage: Mix 1 tsp with water or juice daily, preferably on empty stomach

name: Wheatgrass Powder (100g)
description: Fresh wheatgrass powder for detoxification and energy. Rich in chlorophyll and essential nutrients.
usage: Mix 1 tsp with water on empty stomach daily

name: Digestive Herbal Tea (50g)
description: Soothing herbal tea blend for digestive health. Contains ginger, fennel and mint for stomach comfort.
usage: Steep 1 tsp in hot water for 5 minutes. Drink after meals

name: Immunity Booster Tea (50g)
description: Powerful immunity boosting herbal tea with tulsi, ginger and turmeric. Natural defense against infections.
usage: Steep 1 tsp in hot water for 7 minutes. Drink twice daily

name: Stress Relief Tea (50g)
description: Calming herbal tea blend with chamomile and lavender. Perfect for relaxation and better sleep.
usage: Steep 1 tsp in hot water for 5 minutes. Drink before bedtime

name: Detox Green Tea (50g)
description: Cleansing green tea blend with herbs for natural detoxification. Supports weight management and metabolism.
usage: Steep 1 tsp in hot water for 3 minutes. Drink 2-3 times daily
